document.masterDocTitle: Tomosvaryella Aczél (Diptera: Pipunculidae) of Colombia, with description of two new species

Comments. The specimens observed in this study are smaller and have a surstylus basally narrower compared to the holotype illustrated by Ale-Rocha & Rafael (1995) .
